com.conquestrpg.game

Class Player

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.conquestrpg.game.Player

  • public class Player
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is used as the Player main class where health, textures, sprites and rectangle are held for user input in the RPGame class.
    Version:
    Dec-4-2018
    Author:
    James Lund, Zachary Thomas, Matthew Doan, Aaron Brinkerhoff

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private int baseDamage
      Holds the base damage of the player
      private com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g2d.SpriteBatch character
      SpriteBatch that holds the character
      private int health
      Holds the health of the player
      private com.badlogic.gdx.math.Rectangle playerBox
      Player box used for collisions, door handling and monsters
      private com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g2d.Sprite sprite
      Sprite to render to screen
      private com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.Texture texture
      Texture to hold image file

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Player()
      The Player constructor sets up with a main .png to load and to render later on.
